translation of BSSN_RHS.nb from Zach Etienne's SENR project, from Mathematica into Lua symmath
found at https://math.wvu.edu/~zetienne/SENR/
SHIFTADVECT = true
BIADVECT = true
CFEvolution = EvolveW
CoordSystem = SphericalPolar
InitialDataType = Minkowski
InitialLapseType = PunctureR2
InitialShiftType = Zero
${{r_{coord}}} = {r}$
${{\theta_{coord}}} = {\theta}$
${{\phi_{coord}}} = {\phi}$
$y^i = \{$ $r$, $\theta$, $\phi$ $\}$
coordinate basis $x^i = \{$ $r$, $\theta$, $\phi$ $\}$
non-coordinate basis $x^I = \{$ $\hat{r}$, $\hat{\theta}$, $\hat{\phi}$ $\}$
Using capital letters to denote sums over non-coordinate basis.
Using hats to denote individual non-coordinate basis terms.
Rescaling transform to non-coordinate basis:
${{{e}^I}_i} = {\overset{I\downarrow i\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 0 & 0 \\0 & r & 0 \\0 & 0 & {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{e}_I}^i} = {\overset{I\downarrow i\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 0 & 0 \\0 & \frac{1}{r} & 0 \\0 & 0 & \frac{1}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
grid metric:
${{{\hat{\gamma}}_i}_j} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 0 & 0 \\0 & {r}^{2} & 0 \\0 & 0 & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{\hat{\gamma}}^i}^j} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 0 & 0 \\0 & \frac{1}{{r}^{2}} & 0 \\0 & 0 & \frac{1}{{{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$

${{{{\hat{\Gamma}}^i}_j}_k} = {{{{{\frac{1}{2}}} {{{{\hat{\gamma}}^i}^m}}}} {{({{{{{{\hat{\gamma}}_m}_j}_{,k}} + {{{{\hat{\gamma}}_m}_k}_{,j}}} - {{{{\hat{\gamma}}_j}_k}_{,m}}})}}}$
${{{{\hat{\Gamma}}^i}_j}_k} = {\overset{i\downarrow[{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\left[\begin{matrix}0 & 0 & 0 \\0 & -{r} & 0 \\0 & 0 & -{{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}\end{matrix}\right] \\\left[\begin{matrix}0 & \frac{1}{r} & 0 \\\frac{1}{r} & 0 & 0 \\0 & 0 & -{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right] \\\left[\begin{matrix}0 & 0 & \frac{1}{r} \\0 & 0 & \frac{cos\left(\theta\right)}{sin\left(\theta\right)} \\\frac{1}{r} & \frac{cos\left(\theta\right)}{sin\left(\theta\right)} & 0\end{matrix}\right]\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{{{\hat{\Gamma}}^i}_j}_k}_{,l}} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow[{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}0 & 0 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 0\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}0 & 0 & 0 \\-{1} & 0 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 0\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}0 & 0 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 0 \\-{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}} & -{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} & 0\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}0 & 0 & 0 \\-{\frac{1}{{r}^{2}}} & 0 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 0\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}-{\frac{1}{{r}^{2}}} & 0 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 0\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}0 & 0 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 0 \\0 & -{({{1} - {{{2}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})} & 0\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}0 & 0 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 0 \\-{\frac{1}{{r}^{2}}} & 0 & 0\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}0 & 0 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 0 \\0 & -{\frac{1}{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} & 0\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}-{\frac{1}{{r}^{2}}} & 0 & 0 \\0 & -{\frac{1}{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} & 0 \\0 & 0 & 0\end{matrix}\right]}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
state variables:
${{{h}_I}_J} = {\overset{I\downarrow J\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}} \\{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}} \\{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}} & {h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}} & {h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{{h}_I}_J}_{,k}} = {\overset{I\downarrow[{J\downarrow k\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\overset{J\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}} \\{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}} \\{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{J\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}} \\{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}} \\{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{J\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}} \\{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}} \\{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}\end{matrix}\right]}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{a}_I}_J} = {\overset{I\downarrow J\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{a_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}} & {a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}} & {a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}} \\{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}} & {a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}} & {a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}} \\{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}} & {a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}} & {a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$

${{{\epsilon}_i}_j} = {{{{{{{h}_I}_J}} {{{{e}^I}_i}}}} {{{{e}^J}_j}}}$
${{{\epsilon}_i}_j} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} \\{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} & {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} \\{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} & {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} & {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$

${{{\bar{\gamma}}_i}_j} = {{{{\hat{\gamma}}_i}_j} + {{{\epsilon}_i}_j}}$
${{{\bar{\gamma}}_i}_j} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{1} + {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} \\{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{r}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{1} + {{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} \\{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} & {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{1} + {{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}})}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$

${{{\bar{A}}_i}_j} = {{{{{{{a}_I}_J}} {{{{e}^I}_i}}}} {{{{e}^J}_j}}}$
${{{\bar{A}}_i}_j} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{a_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}} & {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{r}} & {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} \\{{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{r}} & {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} & {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} \\{{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} & {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} & {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{{\epsilon}_i}_j}_{,k}} = {\overset{i\downarrow[{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}} \\{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} \\{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} \\{{r}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} & {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} \\{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} \\{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} \\{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}\end{matrix}\right]}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{\hat{D}_i}\left({{\epsilon}_j}_k\right)} = {{{{{{\epsilon}_j}_k}_{,i}} - {{{{{\epsilon}_j}_d}} {{{{{\hat{\Gamma}}^d}_i}_k}}}} - {{{{{\epsilon}_d}_k}} {{{{{\hat{\Gamma}}^d}_i}_j}}}}$
${{\hat{D}_i}\left({{\bar{\gamma}}_j}_k\right)} = {\overset{j\downarrow[{k\downarrow i\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\left[\begin{matrix}{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}} & {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}} & {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} \\{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}} & {{r}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} + {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} \\{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}} & {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}})}}\end{matrix}\right] \\\left[\begin{matrix}{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}} & {{r}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} + {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} \\{{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} \\{{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}}\end{matrix}\right] \\\left[\begin{matrix}{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}} & {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}})}} \\{{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}} \\{{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}\end{matrix}\right]\end{matrix}\right]}}$
begin verification:
${{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}$ should be ${{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}$ ...? true
${{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}})}}$ should be ${{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}})}}$ ...? true
${{r}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}$ should be ${{r}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}$ ...? true
${{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}}$ should be ${{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}}$ ...? true
end verification
${{{{{\epsilon}_i}_j}_{,k}}_{,l}} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow[{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}} \\{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}} \\{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}} & {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} & {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} \\{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} \\{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}} {{r}}\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} & {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}})}} \\{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} & {{r}} {{({{{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}})}} \\{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}} & {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} & {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} \\{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} \\{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}} ${{\hat{D}_k}\left({{\hat{D}_l}\left({{\bar{\gamma}}_i}_j\right)}\right)} = {\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow[{i\downarrow l\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\overset{i\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({-{({{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}})}})} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({-{({{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}})}})} \\{\frac{1}{r}}{({-{({{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{4}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}}})}})} & -{({{{{{{4}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}}})} & \frac{-{({{{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{4}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{4}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}}})}}{sin\left(\theta\right)} \\{\frac{1}{r}}{({-{({{{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}})} & \frac{-{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{4}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{4}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{4}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}})}}} \\-{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}} {{({{{{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}}})}}} & -{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}} {{({{{{{{{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}} + {{{3}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})}}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{i\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}} & -{({{{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}}})} & -{({{{{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}})} \\-{{{r}} {{({{{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}}} & -{{{r}} {{({{{{{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}}} & \frac{-{{{r}} {{({{{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{3}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} + {{{3}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})}}}}{sin\left(\theta\right)} \\{{r}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}} - {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}} & \frac{-{{{r}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}})}}\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{i\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}} & {{r}} {{({{{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{4}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})}}}}{sin\left(\theta\right)} \\{{r}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} -
