{{{6}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}} \\{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} + {{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{4}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{6}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{6}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{4}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})}}\end{matrix}\right]}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
hatted quantities related to vectors
${{{\beta}^i} = {{{{ב}^I}} {{{{e}_I}^i}}}} = {\overset{i\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{ב^\hat{r}} \\{\frac{1}{r}}{({{ב^\hat{\theta}}})} \\\frac{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{B}^i} = {{{{בּ}^I}} {{{{e}_I}^i}}}} = {\overset{i\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{בּ^\hat{r}} \\{\frac{1}{r}}{({{בּ^\hat{\theta}}})} \\\frac{{בּ^\hat{\phi}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{\Lambda}^i} = {{{{\lambda}^I}} {{{{e}_I}^i}}}} = {\overset{i\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\lambda^\hat{r}} \\{\frac{1}{r}}{({{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}})} \\\frac{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{\Lambda}^i}_{,j}} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}} & {\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}} \\\frac{-{({{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}} - {{{r}} {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}}{{r}^{2}} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}})} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}})} \\\frac{-{({{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}} - {{{r}} {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}}{{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} & \frac{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{\beta}^i}_{,j}} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}} & {ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}} \\\frac{{{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{ב^\hat{\theta}}}}{{r}^{2}} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}})} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}})} \\\frac{{{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{ב^\hat{\phi}}}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}}{{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} & \frac{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{B}^i}_{,j}} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{בּ^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}} & {בּ^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {בּ^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}} \\\frac{{{{r}} {{{בּ^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{בּ^\hat{\theta}}}}{{r}^{2}} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{בּ^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}})} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{בּ^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}})} \\\frac{{{{r}} {{{בּ^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{בּ^\hat{\phi}}}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{בּ^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{בּ^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}}{{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} & \frac{{בּ^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{\beta}^i}_{,j}} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}} & {ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}} \\\frac{{{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{ב^\hat{\theta}}}}{{r}^{2}} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}})} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}})} \\\frac{{{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{ב^\hat{\phi}}}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}}{{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} & \frac{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{\Lambda}^i}_{,j}} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}} & {\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}} \\\frac{-{({{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}} - {{{r}} {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}}{{r}^{2}} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}})} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}})} \\\frac{-{({{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}} - {{{r}} {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}}{{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} & \frac{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{{\beta}^i}_{,j}}_{,k}} = {\overset{i\downarrow[{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}} & {ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}} & {ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}} \\{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}} & {ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}} & {ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}} \\{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}} & {ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}} & {ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{{{{{{r}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}}}}{{r}^{3}} & \frac{-{({{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}})}}{{r}^{2}} & \frac{-{({{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}})}}{{r}^{2}} \\\frac{-{({{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}})}}{{r}^{2}} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}})} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}})} \\\frac{-{({{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}})}}{{r}^{2}} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}})} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}})}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{{{{{{r}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}}}}{{{{r}^{3}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} & \frac{-{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}}})}}{{{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} & \frac{-{({{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}})}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}}} \\\frac{-{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}}})}}{{{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} & \frac{-{({{{{{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})}}{{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{3}}}} & \frac{-{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}})}}{{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} \\\frac{-{({{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}})}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}}} & \frac{-{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}})}}{{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} & \frac{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right]}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{\hat{D}_j}\left({\Lambda}^i\right)} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}} & {{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}} & {{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} \\{\frac{1}{r}}{({{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}})} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{\lambda^\hat{r}}}})} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}})} \\\frac{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} & \frac{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}}} & \frac{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
begin verification:
$\frac{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}$ should be $\frac{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}$ ...? true
${\frac{1}{r}}{({{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}})}$ should be ${\frac{1}{r}}{({{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}})}$ ...? true
${{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}$ should be ${{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}$ ...? true
end verification
${{\hat{D}_j}\left({\beta}^i\right)} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}} & {{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{ב^\hat{\theta}}} & {{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} \\{\frac{1}{r}}{({{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}})} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{ב^\hat{r}}}})} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}})} \\\frac{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} & \frac{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}}} & \frac{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{\hat{D}_k}\left({{\hat{D}_i}\left({\beta}^j\right)}\right)} = {\overset{j\downarrow[{i\downarrow k\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\overset{i\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({-{({{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{{{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}} - {{ב^\hat{\theta}}}}})}})} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({-{({{{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}}})}})} \\{\frac{1}{r}}{({-{({{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{{{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}} - {{ב^\hat{\theta}}}}})}})} & -{({{{{{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{ב^\hat{r}}}})} & \frac{-{({{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}}})}}{sin\left(\theta\right)} \\{\frac{1}{r}}{({-{({{{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}}})}})} & \frac{-{({{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}}})}}{sin\left(\theta\right)} & {{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}} + {{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{i\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\frac{1}{r}}{({{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}})} & \frac{-{({{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{ב^\hat{r}}}})}}{{r}^{2}} & \frac{-{({{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}}})}}{{r}^{2}} \\\frac{-{({{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{ב^\hat{r}}}})}}{{r}^{2}} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{ב^\hat{\theta}}}}})} & \frac{-{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}}} \\\frac{-{({{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}}})}}{{r}^{2}} & \frac{-{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}}} & {\frac{1}{r}}{({{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}} - {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} - {{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{i\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} & \frac{-{({{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}})}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}}} & \frac{-{({{{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}})}}{{{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} \\\frac{-{({{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}})}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}}} & \frac{{{{{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}} - {{ב^\hat{\theta}}}}}{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{r}}} \\\frac{-{({{{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}})}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}} - {{ב^\hat{\theta}}}}}{{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} - {{ב^\hat{\phi}}}}}{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right]}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
BSSN quantities
${{{{\bar{A}}_i}_j}_{,k}} = {\overset{i\downarrow[{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{a_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}} & {a_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {a_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}} \\{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} & {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} & {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} \\{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} & {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} & {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} \\{{r}} {{({{{{r}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} & {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} \\{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{r}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} \\{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{r}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} \\{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{{{r}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}\end{matrix}\right]}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{{\bar{\gamma}}_i}_j}_{,k}} = {\overset{i\downarrow[{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}} \\{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} \\{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} \\{{r}} {{({{2} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} \\{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} \\{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} \\{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{2} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}\end{matrix}\right]}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{{{\bar{\gamma}}_i}_j}_{,k}}_{,l}} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow[{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}} \\{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}} \\{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}} & {h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}} & {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} & {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} \\{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} \\{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}} {{r}}\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} & {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}})}} \\{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} & {{r}} {{({{{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}})}} \\{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}} & {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} & {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} \\{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} \\{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}} {{r}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}} {{r}}\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{2} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} & {{r}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} \\{{r}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}} \\{{r}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}}\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} \\{{r}} {{({{{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}})}} \\{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} & {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}})}} \\{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} & {{r}} {{({{{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}})}} \\{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} \\{{r}} {{({{{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}})}} \\{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}\end{matrix}\right]} & \overset{k\downarrow l\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{2} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} \\{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{({{2} + {{{{4}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{4}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{4}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} \\{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}}\end{matrix}\right]}\end{matrix}\right]}}$

${\bar{\gamma}} = {{{{r}^{4}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{1} + {{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}} + {{{{{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}^{2}}}}} - {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}^{2}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}} - {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}^{2}}}}} - {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}^{2}}} + {{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}^{2}}} + {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}^{2}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}}}$
${{{{\bar{\gamma}}^i}^j} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}} & {\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}} & {\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}} \\{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}} & {\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}} & {\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}} \\{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}} & {\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}} & {\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}\end{matrix}\right]}}} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\frac{1}{\bar{\gamma}}}{({{{{r}^{4}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{1} + {{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}} + {{{{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} - {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}^{2}}} + {{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{\bar{\gamma}}}{({{{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{{{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} - {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{\bar{\gamma}}}{({-{{{{r}^{3}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}} + {{{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}}}})} \\{\frac{1}{\bar{\gamma}}}{({{{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{{{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} - {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{\bar{\gamma}}}{({{{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{1} + {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}} - {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}^{2}}} + {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{\bar{\gamma}}}{({-{{{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}} - {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}}})} \\{\frac{1}{\bar{\gamma}}}{({-{{{{r}^{3}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}} + {{{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}}}})} & {\frac{1}{\bar{\gamma}}}{({-{{{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}} - {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}}})} & {\frac{1}{\bar{\gamma}}}{({{{{r}^{2}}} {{({{1} + {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}} - {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}^{2}}} + {{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}}})}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{{\bar{\Gamma}}_i}_j}_k} = {\overset{i\downarrow[{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\frac{1}{2}}{({{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}})} \\{\frac{1}{2}}{({{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({-{{{r}} {{({{2} + {{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}}})} \\{\frac{1}{2}}{({{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({-{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}}})}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\frac{1}{2}}{({-{({{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{2} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}})} \\{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{2} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}})} \\{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({-{{{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}}})}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\frac{1}{2}}{({-{({{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({-{{{r}} {{({{{{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{2} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}})} \\{\frac{1}{2}}{({-{{{r}} {{({{{{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({-{{{{r}^{2}}} {{({{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}})} \\{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{2} + {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{r}^{2}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}})}\end{matrix}\right]}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{{\bar{\Gamma}}^i}_j}_k} = {\overset{i\downarrow[{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})} \\{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}}})} \\{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({-{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}}})}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}} + {{{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})} \\{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}} + {{{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}}})} \\{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({-{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}}})}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}}} - ${{{{\Delta}^i}_j}_k} = {\overset{i\downarrow[{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\left[\begin{matrix}{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})} \\{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}}})}\end{matrix}\right] \\\left[\begin{matrix}{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})} & \frac{-{({{{{{{2} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{{{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}}} - {{{{r}^{3}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}}})}}{{{2}} {{r}}} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})} \\\frac{-{({{{{{{2} - {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{3}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{{{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}}})} \\{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{{{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}}})}\end{matrix}\right] \\\left[\begin{matrix}{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{3}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{{{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{r}} {{({{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} - {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{3}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})}}{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} \\\frac{-{({{2} + {{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{3}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{{{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} -
