{{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}})}}{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({-{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - ${{{{{\Delta}_i}_j}_k} = {\overset{i\downarrow[{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\Delta_{r r r}} & {\Delta_{r r \theta}} & {\Delta_{r r \phi}} \\{\Delta_{r r \theta}} & {\Delta_{r \theta \theta}} & {\Delta_{r \theta \phi}} \\{\Delta_{r r \phi}} & {\Delta_{r \theta \phi}} & {\Delta_{r \phi \phi}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\Delta_{\theta r r}} & {\Delta_{\theta r \theta}} & {\Delta_{\theta r \phi}} \\{\Delta_{\theta r \theta}} & {\Delta_{\theta \theta \theta}} & {\Delta_{\theta \theta \phi}} \\{\Delta_{\theta r \phi}} & {\Delta_{\theta \theta \phi}} & {\Delta_{\theta \phi \phi}}\end{matrix}\right]} \\\overset{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\Delta_{\phi r r}} & {\Delta_{\phi r \theta}} & {\Delta_{\phi r \phi}} \\{\Delta_{\phi r \theta}} & {\Delta_{\phi \theta \theta}} & {\Delta_{\phi \theta \phi}} \\{\Delta_{\phi r \phi}} & {\Delta_{\phi \theta \phi}} & {\Delta_{\phi \phi \phi}}\end{matrix}\right]}\end{matrix}\right]}}} = {\overset{i\downarrow[{j\downarrow k\rightarrow}]}{\left[\begin{matrix}\left[\begin{matrix}{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}^{2}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}^{2}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}^{2}}}} + {{{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{3}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{3}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{{{{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{3}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{3}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}^{2}}}} + {{{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}^{2}}}}} + {{{{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}}})}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({-{{{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}^{2}}}} + {{{4}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}} - {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}^{2}}}} + {{{4}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}}})}}}})}\end{matrix}\right]\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{\Delta}^i} = {\overset{i\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\Delta^r} \\{\Delta^\theta} \\{\Delta^\phi}\end{matrix}\right]}}} = {\overset{i\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{4}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} - {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}}}} - {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} + {{{{{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{4}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{{r}^{3}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{r}^{3}}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}}} + {{{2}} ${{{\bar{A}}^i}_j} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} ${{{\bar{A}}^i}^j} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} Initial Data
${{{\gamma}_i}_j} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 0 & 0 \\0 & {r}^{2} & 0 \\0 & 0 & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{\hat{\gamma}}_i}_j} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 0 & 0 \\0 & {r}^{2} & 0 \\0 & 0 & {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{\bar{A}}_i}_j} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}0 & 0 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 0\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${K} = {0}$
Lie derivatives
${{{\mathcal{L}_\beta}}\left({{\bar{\gamma}}_i}_j\right)} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}}} & \frac{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}}{sin\left(\theta\right)} & {{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} \\\frac{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}}{sin\left(\theta\right)} & \frac{{{r}} {{({{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}}}{sin\left(\theta\right)} & {{r}} {{({{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} \\{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} & {{r}} {{({{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{\mathcal{L}_\beta}}\left({{\bar{A}}_i}_j\right)} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}}} & \frac{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}}{sin\left(\theta\right)} & {{{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} \\\frac{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}}{sin\left(\theta\right)} & \frac{{{r}} {{({{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}})}}}{sin\left(\theta\right)} & {{r}} {{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} \\{{{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} & {{r}} {{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{2}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{a_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{a_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{a_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}})}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{K}_{,i}} = {\overset{i\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}K_{,{{r}}} \\K_{,{{\theta}}} \\K_{,{{\phi}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{\mathcal{L}_\beta}}\left(K\right)} = {\frac{{{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{K_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{K_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{K_{,{{\theta}}}}}}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}}}}$
${{{\phi}_{,i}} = {{{\frac{-1}{{{2}} {{W}}}}} {{{W}_{,i}}}}} = {\overset{i\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{-{W_{,{{r}}}}}{{{2}} {{W}}} \\\frac{-{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}{{{2}} {{W}}} \\\frac{-{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}{{{2}} {{W}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{{\phi}_{,i}}_{,j}} = {{{\frac{1}{{{2}} {{W}}}}} {{({{{{{{\frac{1}{W}}} {{{W}_{,i}}}}} {{{W}_{,j}}}} - {{{W}_{,i}}_{,j}}})}}}} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{{{({W_{,{{r}}}})}^{2}} - {{{W}} {{W_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}}}{{{2}} {{{W}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}}{{{2}} {{{W}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}}{{{2}} {{{W}^{2}}}} \\\frac{{{{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}}{{{2}} {{{W}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{({W_{,{{\theta}}}})}^{2}} - {{{W}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}}}}{{{2}} {{{W}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}}{{{2}} {{{W}^{2}}}} \\\frac{{{{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}}{{{2}} {{{W}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}}{{{2}} {{{W}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{({W_{,{{\phi}}}})}^{2}} - {{{W}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}}}}{{{2}} {{{W}^{2}}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{\mathcal{L}_\beta}}\left(\phi\right)} = {\frac{-{({{{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}}{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}} {{W}}}}$
${{{\mathcal{L}_\beta}}\left(\alpha\right)} = {\frac{{{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\alpha_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}}}}}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}}}}$
${{\left({{\mathcal{L}_\beta}}\left(\Lambda\right)\right)}^i} = {\overset{i\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{-{({{{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{{{r}} {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}}})}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}}} \\\frac{-{({{{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}} + {{{{{{r}} {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}})}}{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}}} \\\frac{-{({{{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{{{{{r}} {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}})}}{{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{r}^{2}}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
Covariant derivatives of phi and alpha
${{\bar{D}_i}\left(\alpha\right)} = {{\overset{i\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\alpha_{,{{r}}} \\\alpha_{,{{\theta}}} \\\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}_i}$
${{\bar{D}_i}\left(\alpha\right)} = {\overset{i\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{r}}}}}} \\{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{r}}}}}} \\{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{r}}}}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{\bar{D}_i}\left(\phi\right)} = {{\overset{i\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{-{W_{,{{r}}}}}{{{2}} {{W}}} \\\frac{-{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}{{{2}} {{W}}} \\\frac{-{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}{{{2}} {{W}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}_i}$
${{\bar{D}_i}\left(\phi\right)} = {\overset{i\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{-{({{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}}})}}{{{2}} {{W}}} \\\frac{-{({{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}}})}}{{{2}} {{W}}} \\\frac{-{({{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}}})}}{{{2}} {{W}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{\bar{D}_i}\left({{\bar{D}_j}\left(\phi\right)}\right)} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{{{{{2}} {{{({W_{,{{r}}}})}^{2}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{W_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{{{2}} {{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}}{{{4}} {{{W}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{{2}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}}{{{4}} {{{W}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{{2}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}}{{{4}} {{{W}^{2}}}} \\\frac{{{{{2}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}}{{{4}} {{{W}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{{2}} {{{({W_{,{{\theta}}}})}^{2}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{{{{2}} {{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}}}{{{4}} {{{W}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{{2}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}}{{{4}} {{{W}^{2}}}} \\\frac{{{{{2}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}}{{{4}} {{{W}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{{2}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}}}{{{4}} {{{W}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{{{{{{{{2}} {{{({W_{,{{\phi}}}})}^{2}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{{{{{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{W}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}}}{{{4}} {{{W}^{2}}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{{{{{\bar{\gamma}}^i}^j}} {{{\bar{D}_i}\left(\phi\right)}}}} {{{\bar{D}_j}\left(\phi\right)}}} = {\frac{{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{({W_{,{{\phi}}}})}^{2}}}} + {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{({W_{,{{\theta}}}})}^{2}}}} + {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{({W_{,{{r}}}})}^{2}}}}}{{{4}} {{{W}^{2}}}}}$
${{\bar{D}_i}\left({{\bar{D}_j}\left(\alpha\right)}\right)} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{{{{2}} {{\alpha_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{{{{{{{{{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}}})} & {\frac{1}{2}}{({{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{2}} {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{\alpha_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} -
