${{{{{\bar{\gamma}}^i}^j}} {{{\bar{D}_i}\left({{\bar{D}_j}\left(\alpha\right)}\right)}}} = {{\frac{1}{2}}{({-{({{{{2}} {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} $(\phi$ extra terms$)_{ij} =$ $\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{-{({{{{{{2}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{\alpha_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{4}} {{W}} {{{({\alpha_{,{{r}}}})}^{2}}}}} - {{{2}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}}})}}{{{2}} {{W}}} & \frac{-{({{{{{{2}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{4}} {{W}} {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{\alpha_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{\alpha}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{\alpha}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot \hat{\phi}}}}}}}})}}{{{2}} {{W}}} & \frac{-{({{{{{{{{{{{{2}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{4}} {{W}} {{{({\alpha_{,{{\phi}}}})}^{2}}}}} - {{{2}} {{\alpha}} \cdot \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{{{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{\alpha}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{{{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{\alpha}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{W_{,{{r}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}}})}}{{{2}} {{W}}}\end{matrix}\right]}$
${det\left({{\hat{\gamma}}_m}_n\right)} = {{{{r}^{4}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}$
${det\left({{\gamma}_m}_n\right)} = {\gamma}$
${det\left({{\bar{\gamma}}_m}_n\right)} = {{{{{{r}^{4}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} {{\gamma}}}$
${{\left(det\left({{\bar{\gamma}}_m}_n\right)\right)}_{,i}} = {\overset{i\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{{{r}} {{\gamma_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{\gamma}}}})}} \\{{{r}^{4}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}})}} \\{{{r}^{4}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{{\left(det\left({{\bar{\gamma}}_m}_n\right)\right)}_{,i}}_{,j}} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{{{{r}^{2}}} {{\gamma_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{8}} {{r}} {{\gamma_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{12}} {{\gamma}}}})}} & {{{r}^{3}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{8}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}})}} & {{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{{{r}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} \\{{{r}^{3}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{8}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}})}} & {{{r}^{4}}} {{({{{{4}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{\gamma}}} - {{{4}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{4}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} \\{{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{({{{{r}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{4}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} & {{{r}^{4}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{\bar{D}_j}\left({\beta}^i\right)} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{{{{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{3}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}}{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}}} \\\frac{{{{{{{2}} {{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{3}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} {{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}}}} + \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{4}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}}} & \frac{{{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{3}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{3}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{4}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{4}}}} + {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{3}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{r}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{3}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{3}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{3}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{3}}}} + {{{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} - {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}}{{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{\bar{D}_k}\left({\beta}^k\right)} = {\frac{{{{2}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{4}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}}}}}}{{{2}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}}}}$
${{\bar{D}_k}\left({{\bar{D}_j}\left({\beta}^j\right)}\right)} = {\overset{k\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{-{({{{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} - {{{\gamma}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{\gamma_{,{{r}}}}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} + {{{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{{{{{{{{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{\gamma_{,{{r}}{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}} - {{{4}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{\gamma_{,{{r}}}}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{r}}}}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}}} + {{{4}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}}} + {{{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{({\gamma_{,{{r}}}})}^{2}}}}})}}{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}}} \\\frac{{{{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{\gamma}} \cdot {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{\gamma}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{2}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{\gamma_{,{{r}}}}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{{{r}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{\gamma_{,{{r}}}}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{({\gamma_{,{{\theta}}}})}^{2}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{\gamma}^{2}}}}}}{{{2}} {{r}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}} \\\frac{{{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{4}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{\gamma}} \cdot {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{\gamma}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}}}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{r}}}}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{{r}} {{\gamma}} \cdot {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} - {{{r}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{r}}}}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{({\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}})}^{2}}}}} - {{{{ב^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{\gamma_{,{{\phi}}}}} {{\gamma_{,{{\theta}}}}}}}}{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}}}\end{matrix}\right]}}$
${{\bar{D}^k}\left({{\bar{D}_j}\left({\beta}^j\right)}\right)} = {\overset{i\downarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{{{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}{{r}}}}}} + {{{{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}{{r}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} {{{ב^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r r}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\gamma}^{2}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}} trDHat2gammabarDDdDD...
$\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}\frac{-{({{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{{{{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{4}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{r}}}}}}} - DhatLambdaUdD_DD...
$\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}} & {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} - {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}}}} & {{{{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} \\{{r}} {{({{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} + {{\lambda^\hat{r}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{({{{{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\theta}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}} \\{{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{r}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}})}} & {{r}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{({{{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} - {{{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}}} + {{{{\lambda^\hat{r}}}} \cdot {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\phi} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\phi}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}} + {{{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{\phi}}}}} \cdot {{{\lambda^\hat{r}}_{,{{\phi}}}}}}})}}\end{matrix}\right]}$
DGammaU_dot3_DGammaDDD...
$\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}{{{{\Delta^\phi}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{r r \phi}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^\theta}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{r r \theta}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^r}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{r r r}}}}} & {{{{\Delta^\phi}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{r \theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^\theta}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{r \theta \theta}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^r}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{r r \theta}}}}} & {{{{\Delta^\phi}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{r \phi \phi}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^\theta}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{r \theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^r}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{r r \phi}}}}} \\{{{{\Delta^\phi}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\theta r \phi}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^\theta}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\theta r \theta}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^r}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\theta r r}}}}} & {{{{\Delta^\phi}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\theta \theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^\theta}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\theta \theta \theta}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^r}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\theta r \theta}}}}} & {{{{\Delta^\phi}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\theta \phi \phi}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^\theta}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\theta \theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^r}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\theta r \phi}}}}} \\{{{{\Delta^\phi}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\phi r \phi}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^\theta}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\phi r \theta}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^r}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\phi r r}}}}} & {{{{\Delta^\phi}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\phi \theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^\theta}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\phi \theta \theta}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^r}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\phi r \theta}}}}} & {{{{\Delta^\phi}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\phi \phi \phi}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^\theta}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\phi \theta \phi}}}}} + {{{{\Delta^r}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\phi r \phi}}}}}\end{matrix}\right]}$
DGammaUDD_dot12_DGammaDDD...

- {{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\Delta_{\phi \phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}}}} - {{{2}} {{r}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\Delta_{\phi \theta \phi}}}} \cdot DGammaUDD_dot11_DGammaDDD...

\theta}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} {{{\Delta_{\phi r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{r \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}} + {{{r}} \theta}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\Delta_{\phi \hat{\theta}}}_{,{{r}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{\Delta_{\theta \theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \theta}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{r} \hat{r}}}_{,{{\theta}}}}}}}{{{2}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{r}}} & \frac{{{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{\Delta_{\phi \phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\phi \phi}}}} \cdot {{{r}^{3}}} {{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}} \cdot {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} + {{{2}} {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} \phi}}}^{2}}}} + {{{2}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{\Delta_{\phi \theta \theta}}}} \cdot {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{3}}} {{{{\bar{\gamma}^{\theta \phi}}}^{2}}}} + {{{{r}^{3}}} {{{\Delta_{\phi \theta \theta}}}} {{{sin\left(\theta\right)}^{2}}}}} + {{{{{\lambda^\hat{\theta}}}} \cdot {{cos\left(\theta\right)}} {{sin\left(\theta\right)}} {{{r}^{2}}} {{{h_{\hat{\theta} \hat{\phi}}}}}} - ${{{\delta}^i}_j} = {\overset{i\downarrow j\rightarrow}{\left[\begin{matrix}1 & 0 & 0 \\0 & 1 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 1\end{matrix}\right]}}$
